'the fuck?

item.title: Whoa!TV Animated Logo
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

Is Whoa!TV something you made? If it is, I bet you made this thread just to have an excuse to talk about it because you’re lonely…

Y’what now? It’s a film company that covers UFC and other large fight events worldwide. :freeman:

Anyway, thanks for the comments guys! As I said, this was really rushed (made in just over 3 days) due to a short deadline and was planned to be heavily improved on from the start.

FireTime, Imonfire; nice points, I’ll definitely look into that stuff!

Read full topic

item.title: Whoa!TV Animated Logo
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
Like the lighting and texturing but the camera movements need some work. Possibly look into linking the camera to a spline controller. Also never let the camera stop all the way. It can almost stop but make it still zooming in or out a little bit.

Another idea is to make it a little more rough or extreme. Think it would fit with the target market a better (at least when looking at other UFC related maternal) You already have the flaming logo but the music (and again camera movements) could be made a little more… in your face.

Read full topic

It looks like an animated logo from a low budget mexican tv show.

dont make the clown head so speherical, it looks ugly.

Also, a better intro song would be pretty cool.
